item.description:
Just some friend getting together to down some drinks, play some pool, and crawl on to the next pub.

We'll meet at O'Briens on the outside patio at 8:00, stay for a few and then decide on our next stop ... and so on and so on ...

And remember - you can show up even if you don't RSVP - Mark and Mia never cancel an event! Just make sure you call if you can't find us. Mark 631-433-5223.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the outside patio. Call Mark at 631-433-5223 if you can't spot us or if you need to catch us later.
item.name: Good Ole Friday Night Pub Crawl
